channel.title: [REQ] Need Help Adding Combat into a blank 317
channel.description:
Hey all,
I am building a new server from scratch off a base called Primileon. It is a 317 that looks like a 508.
It is a Winterlove framework and I was basically wondering how I would go about adding proper combat. I have basic attacking players, but no attacking npcs or range or magic.
Any help would be greatly appreciated, or if you could just point me in the right direction.
Thanks a bunch.
